relation: Item of the agenda
Official opening ceremony
Adoption of the agenda of the sixth session of the Committee
Admission of observers
Adoption of the summary records of the fifth session of the Committee
Report by the Committee to the General Assembly on its activities (June 2010 to June 2012)
Examination of the reports of States Parties on the implementation of the Convention and on the current status of all elements inscribed on the Representative List
Report of the Consultative Body on its work in 2011
Evaluation of nominations for inscription in 2011 on the List of Intangible Cultural Heritage in Need of Urgent Safeguarding
Evaluation of proposals to the 2011 Register of Best Safeguarding Practices
Evaluation of International Assistance requests greater than US$25,000

Examination of the annual report of Belarus on the results of the measures taken to ensure the safeguarding of the ‘Rite of Kalyady Tsars (Christmas Tsars)’ inscribed on the Urgent Safeguarding List in 2009

Establishment of a Consultative Body for the examination in 2012 of nominations for inscription on the List of Intangible Cultural Heritage in Need of Urgent Safeguarding, proposals to the Register of Best Safeguarding Practices and requests for international assistance greater than US$25,000, and adoption of its terms of reference
Report of the Subsidiary Body on its work in 2011 and evaluation of nominations for inscription in 2011 on the Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity

Establishment of a Subsidiary Body for the examination in 2012 of nominations for inscription on the Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity, and adoption of its terms of reference

Report of the open ended intergovernmental working group on possible measures to improve the treatment of nominations to the Representative List by the Committee, its Subsidiary Body and the Secretariat
Reflection on the criteria for inscription on the Lists
Mechanism for sharing information to encourage multinational nominations
Treatment of correspondence from the public or other concerned parties concerning nominations
Accreditation of non-governmental organizations
Draft plan for the use of the resources of the Fund
Proposals for the celebration of the tenth anniversary of the Convention
Use of the emblem of the Convention by category 2 centres
Date and venue of the seventh session of the Committee
Election of the members of the Bureau of the seventh session of the Committee
Any other business
Adoption of the List of Decisions
Closure of the session

pageTitle: UNESCO Culture Sector - Intangible Heritage - 2003 Convention :
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {5640=Hosted by the Government of Indonesia, the Intergovernmental Committee for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage held its sixth session in Bali, Indonesia, from 22 to 29 November 2011., 3772=Albania, Azerbaijan, Burkina Faso, China, Croatia, Cuba, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Grenada, Indonesia, Iran (Islamic Republic of), Italy, Japan, Jordan, Kenya, Madagascar, Morocco, Nicaragua, Niger, Oman, Paraguay, Republic of Korea, Spain and Venezuela (Bolivarian Republic of), 19848=Vous êtes ici : UNESCO » Culture » Intangible Heritage » Intergovernmental Committee » 2006 >>> 2013 sessions » 6.COM - November 2011}

textBeforeTable: A forum of NGOs took place just before the opening of the Intergovernmental Comittee”. Agenda and documents Mr Toshiyuki Kono, President of the third session of the General Assembly: English H.E. Mr Mohammad Nuh, Minister of Education and Culture of the Republic of Indonesia: English Ms Irina Bokova, Director-General of UNESCO: Multilingual H.E. Mr. Agung Aksono, Minister of People’s Welfare of the Republic of Indonesia: English Speeches Composition and meetings of the Bureau Albania, Azerbaijan, Burkina Faso, China, Croatia, Cuba, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Grenada, Indonesia, Iran (Islamic Republic of), Italy, Japan, Jordan, Kenya, Madagascar, Morocco, Nicaragua, Niger, Oman, Paraguay, Republic of Korea, Spain and Venezuela (Bolivarian Republic of) Committee members of the sixth session Decisions: English|French
